mdRecord.dcterms:title: Office of Egerton & Bro. Baltimore, Md., March 1st 1852: Dear Sir, We take the liberty of sending to your address our circular of the Maryland lotteries for the month of March 1852
Dear Sir, We take the liberty of sending to your address our circular of the Maryland lotteries for the month of March 1852
Magnificent Maryland lotteries for March, 1852. Payment of prizes guaranteed by the state of Maryland
Maryland lotteries for March, 1852
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Caption, p. [2]: Maryland lotteries for March, 1852. Caption, p. [3]: Magnificent Maryland lotteries for March, 1852. Payment of prizes guaranteed by the state of Maryland.
Signed, in print, on p. [1]: Egerton & Bro. Box 103 Post Office, Baltimore, Md. John B. Egerton, Chas. C. Egerton, Jr.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: From the Papers of the Walker Family, MSS 1545.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Maryland State Lottery.
